duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist anchor and executive producer in setting show’s editorial direction
Help build rundowns for regular programming as well as breaking news and special programming
Coordinate the team: line producers, associate producers, writers, editors, and other staff
Serve as a senior leader in the control room
Help implement training and best practices for the team
Provide ongoing mentoring and support to staff
Manage editorial relationships and collaboration with other teams
Act as Executive Producer in his/her absence

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in journalism, or a related field, or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience
